actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit payment of the annual reporting fee to certain joint apprenticeship training committees.

summary.text: Permits payment, by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs, of a Veterans' annual reporting fee to specified joint apprenticeship training committees. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1784 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit payment of the annual reporting fee to certain joint apprenticeship training committees.
